attributes.action: call an immediate halt to the implementation of the Department of Health's polyclinic programme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call for:

a) a review of the policy by a group of recognised primary care experts, reporting directly to the Prime Minister; and

b) a formal debate of the recommendations of the review in the House of Commons, 

prior to any further implementation, re-commencement or re-configuration of the polyclinic procurement programme.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
